spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout distortions detected. The stairs are incorrectly placed and oriented (running exterior-to-interior rather than along the back wall). Bed 4 and Bed 3 have been merged and reinterpreted as a kitchen/dining area. Significant door and wall alignment discrepancies throughout.

structural_fidelity.notes: While the roof is removed and the model is floating on a dark background, there are hallucinated structural elements including extra kitchen islands and cabinets. Small text on cabinets violates the 'no text' constraint. Layout reinterpretation is severe.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement fails to match the floor plan. The activity room lacks the large corner sofa; bedrooms are missing robes or have added hallucinated kitchen fixtures. The balcony furniture is simplified but relatively close in position.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Correct isometric orthographic camera and low-poly aesthetic. Flat shading and matte colors are well-executed. Points deducted for visible text/UI artifacts on some furniture pieces.

detected_errors.description: Missing Bedroom 4 and Bedroom 3 functional layout; replaced by hallucinated kitchen.
Significant stairs misplacement; stairs in 3D are rotated and moved relative to 2D plan.
Hallucinated kitchen cabinetry and appliances not present in the original floor plan.
Unintelligible text labels/marks visible on kitchen counters and bedroom furniture.
